title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 442.3 - Supplemental application requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 442.3 - Supplemental application requirements

State Regulations

In addition to the general application requirements found
in section
440.7
of this Title, applications under this Part shall include the following
additional information: (a) the
location of the property shown on a map as directed by the office; (b) photographs or images showing the
existing condition of the property as directed by the office; and
(c) a narrative description of the property's
historic significance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
442.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
